moves.1. d4: In this game was I in bad positions and piece-underdog at several times, but find a way, (maybee with help of my opponents mistake, but I also did some) to change -9,6 to +12,3 and won the game by turning the advantage around.
moves.1... d5 2. g3 Nc6 3. Bg2 Nf6 4. Nf3 Bf5: This move told the computer analyze as:Inaccuracy: -1.14, but in my mind was the next move NxNc3 and 2 pawns at c-line was not interesting to have!
moves.7... Bxe4 8. O-O h6 9. e3 Be7 10. Nh4: And here did I a mistake, was in thought that opponent would capture Bg2 first, and forgotted that opponent moved Be7 in capturing psition for Nh4, which also went the nevt move.
moves.10... Bxh4 11. Qg4: so I had to move Qg4 to stop the away taking of defending pawns forward the King, now was I in piece-underdog for a while of 13 moves,
moves.11... Bxg2 12. Kxg2 Bf6 13. c3 O-O 14. e: And here by the treath to Ng6 did opponent missed that Bf6 went unguarded by N:s moving,
moves.24. Rxf6: and the piece advantage was over
moves.24... exd4 25. h6 Qh7 26. cxd4 Ng6 27. R: Here was my position worse, I  had maked a: Blunder: -9.64 told me the computer analyze after end of game. Rf3 had been better, but it went no piece losing............
moves.34... Qc4+ 35. Bf4: And the check stopped with this move, and my thought was Rxh5 but ...........
moves.35... Ne5+: another move which maked the -9.6 to +3.78
moves.36. Rxe5: I had to capture by Rxe5
moves.36... f6: and to let Q came in at B: kingside and check instead of move R from e5
moves.37. Kf5 fxe5: As expected captured B W:s R At e5
moves.38... Kf7: perhaps had Kf8 been better, but h6+ had leaved B:s Q for capturing and Kh8 also by Bxe5, so....
moves.39. Qg6+ Kf8: Here could I check with Bh6+ and captured B: R after Rxh6
moves.40. Qf6+: but choised to check by Qf6+ which could give me opportunity to capture B:s  Rd8, if  K:s move went back to g8
moves.40... Ke8 41. Qxe5+: here have I to make a possibility for W:s  Rook at 1-line to check later
moves.41... Kd7: And here have the score become +12.21
